divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting outside on my patio when I saw two bright objects flying somewhat fast and slow down. I ran to grab my camera because I noticed these things flying in an odd formation and leaving a contrail, and not some sort of chemtrail. I never really looked at the film until now. It is in HD format. You can clearly see 1 orb materialize in the middle of the screen at 00:00:04 and start to spiral vertically. 00:00:05 a second orb is seen on the left side of the screen moving at a linear path to the right of the screen. 00:00:06 1 orb vanishes before it leaves the right of the screen. a few milliseconds later the vertical one disappears. 00:00:07 camera starts to blur out and the bright one on the bottom vanishes? I stopped filming, I get images everyday now, I woke up with my camera in IR mode and Sony says its not possible on that camera Sony DSC-W370, I don't know where the information came from but the next day I used my night vision goggles in the dark with the white balance one button push setting and figured it out. The day this happened I had the same feeling that I was meant to see it or told to.
Summary: Two discs flying and two orbs. One orb performs a spiral the other passes through the middle of it. Then they all vanish.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Englewood
